{"id":1082160492,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1698068613,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1082160492/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotone Increasing Digits","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool fxn(int n){\n        string s= to_string(n);\n        int l= s.length();\n        vector<int>v;\n        vector<int>a;\n        \n        while(n){\n            int d= n%10;\n            v.push_back(d);\n            n=n/10;\n        }\n        reverse(v.begin(),v.end());\n        for(int i=0;i<l;i++){\n          a.push_back(v[i]);  \n        }\n        sort(a.begin(),a.end());\n        if(a==v)return true;\n        return false;\n    }\n    int monotoneIncreasingDigits(int n) {\n        \n        for(int i=n;i>0;i--){\n            if(fxn(i))return i;\n        }\n        return 1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotone-increasing-digits","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
